user is on "Secure Area" and see "You logged into a secure area!"

elements.name: Error message validation while invalid login

user sees "Your username is invalid!" is displayed

user sees "Your username is invalid!" is displayed

user sees "Your username is invalid!" is displayed

name: Login
description:
Login Success: http://localhost:7080/login credentials: tomsmith/SuperSecretPassword!
  Login Failure: http://localhost:7080/login Login fail invalid credentials

name: Checkboxes
description: CheckBoxes: http://localhost:7080/checkboxes Check and uncheck boxes

steps.name: user performs right click on the box
Javascript alert is triggered and text "You selected a context menu" is displayed

name: Context Menu
description: CContextMenu: http://localhost:7080/context_menu Right-click in the box to see one called 'the-internet'. Test JavaScript alert text on Right-Click.

steps.name: user drags one square and drops on another square
user sees boxes "A" and "B" are swapped

name: Drag and Drop
description: Drag and Drop: http://localhost:7080/drag_and_drop Perform Drag And Drop in a WebDriver test.

name: Dropdown
description: Dropdown: http://localhost:7080/dropdown Test dropdown using WebDriver.

steps.name: user sees "It's gone!" and checkbox is removed
user clicks Add button and check the checkbox
users clicks on Enable button and send text "Hello!" to the text box
users sees "It's enabled!" and text into the text "Hello!" box

name: Dynamic Controls
description: Dynamic Controls: http://localhost:7080/dynamic_controls Test Dynamic Controls using Explicit Waits.

name: Dynamic Loading
description: Dynamic Loading: http://localhost:7080/dynamic_loading/2 Test Dynamic Loading using Explict Waits.

steps.name: user clicks link to download file
user sees file "some-file.txt" downloaded to the folder "/Users/robespierre/Downloads"

name: File Download
description: File Download: http://localhost:7080/download Test File Download.

steps.name: user chooses the file "/Users/robespierre/Downloads/fileToUpload.txt" to upload and clicks on Upload button

name: File Upload
description: File Upload: http://localhost:7080/upload Test File Upload.

steps.name: user sees the menu buttons are visible and accessible

name: Floating Menu
description: Floating Menu: http://localhost:7080/floating_menu Test Floating Menu.

steps.name: User able to enter "Text" into the textBox
user clicks on buttons and interacts with "Alert" "Confirm" "Prompt" alerts, enters "Hello"

name: Javascript Alerts
description: JavaScript Alerts: http://localhost:7080/javascript_alerts Test confirm JS Alert.

steps.name: user sees the error and verifies "JavaScript error"

name: Javascript Error
description: JavaScript Error: http://localhost:7080/javascript_error Test JS error.

steps.name: user hovers on every users avatar
user sees additional information under Avatar
user clicks on the profile link
user sees message "Sinatra doesn’t know this ditty."

name: Mouse Hover
description: Mouse Hover: http://localhost:7080/hovers Test Mouse Hover.

steps.name: user clicks the link to load the new message
user sees "New Window" sign in newly opened window

name: Open In Tab
description: Open in New Tab: http://localhost:7080/windows Test Link Opens in new tab.
